hi! This torrent is contains Counter Strike?
Half life-Change Game-Counter Strike?

I havent tested this, not sure if it contains counter strike, but you can download counter strike seperately and add it to the HL2 folder, it should work (also episode 1 and 2 should be possible to be added this way)

This does not work!

when running hl2.exe with wine.
